graph_title: Montant total des ressources allouées au développement, par pays bénéficiaire et donateur et type d’apport (aide publique au développement, investissement étranger direct et autres)
indicator_name: Montant total des ressources allouées au développement, par pays bénéficiaire et donateur et type d’apport (aide publique au développement, investissement étranger direct et autres)
SDG_GOAL: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET: Target 10.b: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 10.b.1: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g., official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
STAT_CONC_DEF: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow comprises of Official Development Assistance (ODA), other official flows (OOF) and private flows.
